snippet.title: OFFICIAL GAMEPLAY REVEAL PART 1 | INSTINCTION
snippet.description:
Best way to support us is Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1675680/Instinction/
If you want access to WIP, Behind-the-Scenes, models and more consider joining our Supporter Discord, details here: https://www.playinstinction.com/

SUPPORTER EDITION BENEFITS:
+ Full game (Q4 2025)
+ Alpha Access (Q3 2024)
+ Experimental branch
+ Access to SUPPORTER only Discord:
| + WIP content | rigging videos
| + Monthly Briefing updates | bi-annual AMA
| + Exclusive behind-the-scenes content
| + Post release documentary
| + Private screening of gameplay videos before release
+ First DLC Free
+ Supporter only skins, UI & menu
+ Digital copy of INSTINCTION soundtrack
+ Digital art book

Visit our website https://www.playinstinction.com/ to Pre-Order INSTINCTION for PC.
Final game will be available on PC and Console.

We'll be releasing 3 gameplay videos this year, showcasing very different things and experiences.
- This first video occurs very early in the game, Izzy is still getting to grips with the situation.
- The second video will showcase combat with human and dinosaur AI, 3 weapons and some unique mechanics we've never revealed, you'll also see the local civilization along with their impressive architecture/technology.
- The third will entail destruction, swimming and reveal another unique mechanic.

We're in active development and continue to improve performance, assets, animations, environments, mechanics and overall visual fidelity. Audio settings allow for asynchronous adjustments.
